mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_NO, REPORTER_NO, REPORTED_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_RPNO.NEXTVAL, #{reporterNo}, #{reportedNo}, #{reportContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORTED_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE AS "CREATE_DATE" FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON (REPORTED_NO = USER_NO) WHERE REPORTED_NO = #{reportedNo} AND REPORTED_NO LIKE '%${search}%' GROUP BY REPORT_NO, REPORTED_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, R.CREATE_DATE
SELECT COUNT(REPORTED_NO) AS "REPORT_COUNT" FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_NO = #{search}
SELECT COUNT(REPORTED_NO) AS "REPORT_COUNT" FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_NO = #{reportedNo}
